property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

property.name: description
property.value: This is [[Axis]]'s charging locker. It breaks open after the generator is turned on. He returns here after he is spared.

property.name: description
property.value: This turns on the generator, simultaneously allowing [[Clover]] to continue and powering all the robots.

property.name: description
property.value: This flickering sign announces the entrance to the Steamworks.

property.name: description
property.value: The first encounter with Axis. In a [[Neutral Route|Neutral]] and [[Pacifist Route]], he will send [[Clover]] (and [[Ceroba]] on Pacifist) through a trapdoor. In a [[Genocide Route]], he will attempt to initate combat, but Clover will shoot him and he will flee through the trapdoor.

property.name: description
property.value: On the [[Pacifist Route]], [[Ceroba]] has the idea to build [[Axis]] a partner. [[Clover]] must pick out four pieces of trash from around the room and shape it into a trash robot.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Ceroba]] reads through Chujin's employee reports and discovers he was terrible at making robots, to the point where [[Asgore]] directly told him to stop.

property.name: page
property.value: Chujin Ketsukane

property.name: description
property.value: On a [[Neutral Route]], [[Axis]] will be behind the door when [[Clover]] opens it. He tries to pour [[Hydrochloric Acid]] on them but drops it and falls through the hole in the floor it creates. On a [[Genocide Route]], he speaks to them from behind the door when they first enter the room.

properties.property:
The Steamworks generator. After flipping the generator switch, this will once again provide power to the Steamworks.
On a [[Genocide Route]], [[Clover]] shoots the generator. When they turn it on, it is unstable, affecting machinery in other parts of the facility.

property.name: description
property.value: After defeating [[Axis]], this can be used to fast travel to and from the room after The Furnace. In the [[Pacifist Route]], [[Feisty Four#Ed|Ed]] and [[Starlo]] use it to travel.

property.name: description
property.value: Axis's shadowy figure can be seen watching [[Clover]] before running along the catwalk here.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] can leave through this door twice. They get caught and returned to detainment by Axis both times. He locks the door after their second try.

property.name: description
property.value: After defeating [[Axis]], this can be used to fast travel to and from the laundry room by the generator. In the [[Pacifist Route]], [[Feisty Four#Ed|Ed]] and [[Starlo]] use it to travel.

property.name: description
property.value: This station controls all the Steamworks bots except [[Axis]]. [[Clover]] tries to use this to shut down the bots on a [[Neutral Route|Neutral]] and [[Pacifist Route]], which extends the bridge to the next room but does not shut them down.

properties.property:
Axis's eyes blend in with the lights here and disappear when [[Clover]] walks far enough away.
This does not happen on the [[Genocide Route]].

property.name: description
property.value: If the Fun Value is between 11 and 15, the conveyor will spit out the Annoying Dog after 7 items, who will run away.

property.name: page
property.value: Fun Value

property.name: description
property.value: When the Fun Value is between 11 and 15, the static clears to show a grinning [[dr:Ice-E|Ice-E]]. Interacting with the screen causes it to scream and shut off.

property.name: page
property.value: Fun Value

property.name: description
property.value: [[Axis]] chases [[Clover]] down through this room. On a [[Genocide Route]], Clover chases him down instead.

properties.property:
[[Axis]] throws energy balls at [[Clover]] through the broken window. If they are hit, they are put into a battle where they dodge energy balls from all sides.
This is skipped in the [[Genocide Route]].

property.name: description
property.value: [[Ceroba]] sits down and takes a breather here. She talks to [[Clover]] about [[Kanako]].

property.name: description
property.value: Mr. Screen again forces [[Ceroba]] and [[Clover]] to complete the puzzle.

property.name: page
property.value: Mr. Screen

property.name: description
property.value: Mr. Screen loudly interrupts [[Ceroba]] when she is hiding from [[Axis]]. She kills her

property.name: page
property.value: Mr. Screen

property.name: description
property.value: This elevator links to Hotland elevator R3. On a [[Pacifist Route]], [[Clover]] is stopped before entering and is taken away by [[Feisty Four#Ed|Ed]] as [[Starlo]] follows [[Ceroba]] fleeing through this elevator.

property.name: description
property.value: The book "Mysteries of the Underground" is found here.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] enters the [[Steamworks]] through this entrance from the Dunes. The entrance remains closed until the battle against [[Axis]] on the [[Pacifist]] and [[Neutral Route]]s. If the Dunes kill count was exhausted on a [[Genocide Route]], this entrance never re-opens.

property.name: description
property.value: On a [[Pacifist Route]], [[Ceroba]] chooses to go west into the [[Steamworks]] Factory. On a [[Neutral Route|Neutral]] and [[Genocide Route]], Clover does not have the necessary passcode and has to enter the laboratory to the north instead.

property.name: description
property.value: The Greenhouse is where energy plants were grown. At the time [[Clover]] enters, with nobody to take care of it, the Greenhouse has been completely overrun by the plants. [[Guardener]], the Steamworks miniboss, is fought here on the [[Neutral]] and [[Pacifist Route]]s.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] and [[Ceroba]] enter the Factory on the [[Pacifist Route]]. This is where G, robot, and other kinds of manufacturing used to take place. [[Chujin]] also used to work here.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] enters the Chemistry Lab on the [[Neutral]] and [[Genocide Route]]s. When the Steamworks were operational, this was where chemistry experiments and energy research took place.

property.name: page
property.value: Chemistry Lab

property.name: description
property.value: This bot ferrys [[Clover]], as well as [[Ceroba]] if she is accompying, across the large lake.

property.name: page
property.value: Manta Bot

property.name: description
property.value: This bot kept the time for the Underground. Its time is off and it is unaware the Steamworks are shut down.

property.name: page
property.value: Grandfather Clock

property.name: description
property.value: This bot drinks the coolant out of the lake.

property.name: page
property.value: Boba Drinker

property.name: description
property.value: The Hermit is a monster in a hidden room behind the cabinet. They are a former employee who has hidden out in the Steamworks ever since it shut down to keep doing science. Their room is only accessible in a [[Neutral Route]].

property.name: description
property.value: After sparing [[Axis]] on the [[Pacifist Route]], Jandroid is here mopping the bridge. They no longer seem to hate cleaning.

property.name: description
property.value: After sparing [[Axis]] on the [[Pacifist Route]], Goosic stands here in the commons and discusses music it is broadcasting.

property.name: description
property.value: After sparing [[Axis]] on the [[Pacifist Route]], Telly and Vis can be found here bickering.

property.name: description
property.value: Editing the game files to enter the chemistry lab after sparing [[Axis]] on the [[Pacifist Route]] shows a normally unseen Sousborg. He talks about cooking and monster culture.

property.name: description
property.value: Mr. Screen appears here and forces [[Ceroba]] and [[Clover]] to complete the packaging puzzle to proceed.

property.name: page
property.value: Mr. Screen

property.name: description
property.value: The third Lil Bot appears here after sparing [[Axis]] on the [[Pacifist Route]], planning to take [[Guardener]] on a date.

property.name: page
property.value: Lil Bots

property.name: description
property.value: The second Lil Bot appears here after sparing [[Axis]] on the [[Pacifist Route]]. They tell [[Clover]] some bot facts.

property.name: page
property.value: Lil Bots

property.name: description
property.value: The first Lil Bot appears here after sparing [[Axis]] on the [[Pacifist Route]]. It talks about the fate of the seven other Lil Bots [[Clover]] never met. They all jumped into the lake and died.

property.name: page
property.value: Lil Bots

property.name: description
property.value: This broom references [[Dalv]]'s [[broom]].

property.name: description
property.value: After his battle, Axis can be found here if he was spared (excluding a Genocide Route aborted in the Steamworks.) He will talk about the various plans for the future the bots have. On a [[Pacifist Route]], he will also talk about [[Daisy]] which is next to him.

property.name: description
property.value: The Steamworks Commons UGPS sign.

property.name: page
property.value: Underground Postal Service

property.name: description
property.value: The Steamworks Control Station UGPS sign. On a [[Neutral Route]], the Mail Whale arrives to give Martlet's letter to Clover here.

property.name: page
property.value: Underground Postal Service

property.name: description
property.value: Adjust the liquid in the tubes using arrow keys so the fluid in all three fits in between the markings.

property.name: description
property.value: Adjust the liquid in the tubes using arrow keys so the fluid in all four fits in between the markings.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] has to avoid steam periodically releasing from the vents on the floor. If hit, they enter a mini battle where they dodge steam bullets. Once completed, they automatically switch the lever to disable the puzzle.

property.name: description
property.value: Interacting with the bottom-right corner of this room opens the door to the Macro Froggit room.

property.name: page
property.value: Macro Froggit

properties.property: [[Clover]] has to avoid steam periodically releasing from the vents on the floor. If hit, they enter a mini battle where they dodge steam bullets. Once completed, they automatically switch the lever to disable the puzzle. A button at the end of this puzzle must be pressed to open the gates in the lake to reach the next area.

property.name: description
property.value: The elevator passcode is written here.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] has to break through the lock on the door. Various items that Clover can balance on their head and toss into the Compound Computer are in this room. They must toss in both hydrogen and chlorine, then complete a maze minigame to obtain the Hydrochloric Acid they need.

property.name: page
property.value: Hydrochloric Acid

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] and [[Ceroba]] work together to box the red and blue goods to get to the next area of the Factory. The confirm key is used to box blue goods passing under the press, the cancel key is used to box the red goods, and different colored ones must be ignored.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] and [[Ceroba]] work together to sort the red and blue boxes from the last room to get to the next area of the Factory. The left and right buttons must be pressed to send boxes into the blue and red chutes.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] and [[Ceroba]] must sneak around to light the furnaces to reveal the door passcode while avoiding [[Axis]]. Each furnace reveals a letter and a number (for example, A4), and numbers in the passcode have to be arranged in the order of the letters (for example, A3, B2, C3, D1) gives a passcode of 3231.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] has to avoid steam periodically releasing from the vents on the floor. If hit, they enter a mini battle where they dodge steam bullets. Once completed, they automatically switch the lever to disable the puzzle.

property.name: description
property.value: The room where Macro Froggit is found. This room is opened after pressing the switch in Grandfather Clock's room. Upon placing the three golden items found throughout the Underground on the pedestals, Macro Froggit's gate opens.

property.name: page
property.value: Macro Froggit

property.name: description
property.value: The hydrogen to be used to make the acid is on this counter.

property.name: page
property.value: Hydrochloric Acid

property.name: description
property.value: The chlorine to be used to make the acid is in this cabinet.

property.name: page
property.value: Hydrochloric Acid

properties.property: "To: Science Division Employees have reported the generator is showing more wear than ever. The engineers predict the machine won't last longer than one year from now. I need you to speed up the testing of alternate power sources. The Underground depends on it. - Head Office"

"To: Head Office More tests are underway, both biological and mechanical. We don't know which direction will ultimately be best for monsterkind yet. However, the chemistry lab did have a breakthrough regarding a white plant. I'll get back to you on that once further testing has commenced. - Science Division"

"To: Head Office I think we've got it! The white plants have proven able to generate electricity at a fantastic rate! The only issues are that they grow four times faster than normal flora... ...and once their power is drained, they wilt into a dark, sticky substance. If this is greenlit, we will need a new division to tend to these plants. Otherwise, working conditions will suffer greatly. - Science Division"

"To: Science Division The plants should suffice as a temporary solution. I've heard one of our top scientists is working toward a new compound. One made from special energy. It could be the key we need. Much more time is necessary to develop it properly, however. As for the proposed "Greenhouse Division", I have an idea. Cheaper, more efficient, and trustworthy. I'll send you some blueprints shortly. Thank you for your time and research. - Head Office"

property.name: description
property.value: "Excellence in Engineering Award: Dr. Rutherford-Oscar"

property.name: description
property.value: "Decency in Engineering Award: Prof. Daniels"

property.name: description
property.value: "You Tried in Engineering Award: Mr. Chujin Ketsukane"

properties.property: "Greatness in C-- (You can't make out the rest.)"

"Safety is priority! - Wear your Steamworks [[Safety Goggles]] during work hours! - Always keep your Steamworks ID with you! - Decontaminate yourself of any biohazards before leaving the premises! - But most of all, have fun :)"

"(A poster of a smiling monster with a slogan above them.) "Tomorrow means the Surface!""
On a [[Genocide Route]], this interaction instead reads: "(Some kind of propaganda.)"

"The first interaction reads: To: King ASGORE. This project, while exciting, will be quite the undertaking. We will need Mining Co. to work overtime to provide the necessary materials. Furthermore, a meeting was conducted at the Factory. I'm happy to report that everyone is on board! There already are many great robot ideas floating about. [[Sousborg|Cooking]], [[Jandroid|cleaning]], [[Goosic|recreation]]; the motivation is through the roof! Though... one engineer suggested we take this further with a "[[Axis|protection bot]]." I am quite unsure about that proposition but you have the final say. In any case, we will see this completed. - Prof. Z.
The second interaction reads: (The paper underneath reads:) Project: Metal & Magic: Effective immediately, cease home utility production at the Factory- (The rest of the page is redacted.)"
"(Many sticky notes are posted around the smashed-in PC.) We've replaced your computer six times now. Please control your temper. It's just Solitaire."
"(A dilapiated desk with several ripped up notes strewn about.) (Among the notes sits a piece of paper with one thing written on it:) How do I tell them?"
"DOWNSIZING IMMINENT! But definitely not for the employee who's reading this. You're doing a great job!"

"(A few sticky notes are pinned to the cork board.)
Interaction 1: Will someone please tell Mr. Fish to stop using the lab to create colored slime? I don't care if it makes funny noises, it does not count as work.
Interaction 2: Todo: -Try new things -Fail miserably -Quit my job.
Interaction 3: (This one consists of all 31 trillion numbers of pi written in crayon.)
Interaction 4: (This one pounts to the note with the pi numbers.) What a showoff. Check it: pi x infinity. Owned B)"
"(The note on the powered off PC reads:) The future is bright. Hang in there!"
"Richter B. Oni Engineering Certificate - X/X/20XX"

"Today's assignment: Compound mixing! The head office said we have free use over the Compound Computer for today. They also said the machine exploding and killing us all is a risk they're willing to take. So grab anything you can and toss it in! Have fun!"

"Help wanted for Project: Steam! Are you a monster with an above average IQ? Probably not. But in case you are, we NEED YOUR KNOWLEDGE! King ASGORE has called on the greatest monster minds to help develop society! Scientists, engineers, mathematicians, janitors - you name it! Sign up at the King's settlement and make your way southeast. You'll know you've arrived when you see a metallic construction site. The Steamworks: Tomorrow means the Surface!"
"Wishing everyone a productive final workday. Feel free to take pictures with your creations, as they must be left behind. As always, thank you for your contributions to the Steamworks."

property.name: description
property.value: "Tomorrow means the Surface!"

properties.property: "Break room rules: Do not work in the break room. Do not fix in the break room."
"Metalworks Emergency Escape Plan (or MEEP): In case someone sets the room on fire, do not use the elevator. Evacuate down to floor 01 or use a passcode to access floor 03."

property.name: description
property.value: "(An unfortunate incident.)"

properties.property: "I am trying to grow energy plants but I always end up with these leafy things. They smell like honey and won't stop making trumpet noises! Why does this keep happening to me?"

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE point "Steamw. - Raised Path".

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE point "Steamw. - Generator".

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE point "Steamw. - Lake".

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE point "Steamw. - ???".

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE point "Steamw. - Offices".

property.name: description
property.value: The location of the "Steamw. - Commons" SAVE point on the [[Pacifist Route]].

property.name: description
property.value: The location of the "Steamw. - Commons" SAVE point on the [[Neutral Route|Neutral]] and [[Genocide Route]].

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE point "Greenhouse".

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE point "Steamw. - Crossroads".

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE point "Steamw. - Laboratory".

property.value: SAVE point "Steamw. - Botany Hall".

property.value: SAVE point "Factory - Lobby".

property.value: SAVE point "Factory - Offices".

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE point "The Furnace".

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE point "A Road Ahead".

properties.property: Vendy is a robotic vending machine. They respond to [[Clover]] enthusiastically when they have a Steamworks ID and rudely when they don't. Clover can buy: * [[Gravity Granola]] for 36G * [[Dihydrogen Monoxide]] for 32G * [[Popato Chisps]] for 24G * [[Safety Goggles]] for 70G On a [[Genocide Route]], Vendy will stay silent out of fear but still dispense items.

Mo's stand in the Steamworks. It catches fire, so he just sells items out of his pockets. He offers: * [[Moss Salad]] * [[Grassy Fries]] * [[Flower Stew]] Each cost 30G. On the [[Genocide Route]], Clover instead has the choice to rob him of 450G.

property.name: description
property.value: A stick of Beef Jerky can be found in this washer.

property.name: page
property.value: Beef Jerky

property.name: description
property.value: Grassy Fries can be taken from inside this box.

property.name: page
property.value: Grassy Fries

property.name: description
property.value: A Gravity Granola can be taken from inside this broken [[Vendy]] model.

property.name: page
property.value: Gravity Granola

property.name: description
property.value: There is a stick of Beef Jerky inside this trashcan.

property.name: page
property.value: Beef Jerky

property.name: description
property.value: There is a Cake sitting on the counter. [[Clover]] can pick it up on a [[Neutral Route]], but on a [[Genocide Route]], they leave it.

property.name: description
property.value: There is water inside this cabinet.

property.name: page
property.value: Dihydrogen Monoxide

property.name: description
property.value: 60G can be picked up from this machine.

property.name: description
property.value: A Gravity Granola is inside this box.

property.name: page
property.value: Gravity Granola

property.name: description
property.value: A bucket of Nails are found in this box. They are ammo.

property.name: description
property.value: The Golden Bandana can be obtained here after defeating [[Macro Froggit]] on a [[Neutral Route|Neutral]] or [[Pacifist Route]]. On a [[Genocide Route]], this chest is instead tossed out in front of the gates inside of the room.

property.name: page
property.value: Golden Bandana

property.name: description
property.value: [[Flowey]] gives [[Clover]] the Friendliness Pellets here on the [[Neutral Route]].

property.name: name
property.value: Friendliness Pellets

property.name: description
property.value: 60G can be picked up from this trash can.

property.name: description
property.value: An outline of how the Steamworks operate. This goes into [[Clover]]'s mail.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] makes their Steamworks ID here, allowing them access to the rest of the chemistry wing. It goes in their mail.

property.name: description
property.value: There is a crumpled up essay in the trash can with the solution to the [[Hydrochloric Acid]] puzzle here. It goes in [[Clover]]'s mail.

property.name: description
property.value: After completing its puzzle, the machine outputs the acid here. [[Clover]] is meant to dissolve the lock with it, but they also have the option to drink the acid and instantly die.

property.name: page
property.value: Hydrochloric Acid

property.name: description
property.value: Scripted encounter with Jandroid.

property.name: description
property.value: Scripted encounter with Goosic.

property.name: description
property.value: Miniboss battle against Guardener.

property.name: description
property.value: Scripted encounter with Telly-Vis.

property.name: description
property.value: Scripted and only encounter with Sousborg.

properties.property:
Big frog.
The secret boss, Macro Froggit, is fought here. On a [[Genocide Route]], this encounter does not occur; instead, the gate opens, the [[Golden Bandana]] chest is tossed out in front of [[Clover]], and the gate closes.

property.name: page
property.value: Macro Froggit

property.name: description
property.value: Boss battle against Axis.

property.name: description
property.value: After crossing this point in the [[Steamworks]], encounters stop appearing. This is important in the [[Genocide Route]], because if the kill count has not been exhausted by this point, the route reverts to a [[Neutral Route]] after battling [[Axis]]. '''The game does not warn about this!'''

object.name: Path to other side of lake
